Reviews.Title: Compact, easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Not really Steve "NRS"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my wife. Her requirements were, easy to use, easy to read, must have bluetooth,and should not be to big.This phone seems to be just right.Her only  negative was it has a very limited number of preloaded ring tones. It does have the ability to browse the web but it was not a priorty for us with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, reception is not the best.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Davis
Reviews.Content: I needed a small phone to take overseas and use with a different company.  It fits the bill and does a great job.  My only complaint is that the signal is weak sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Like New
Reviews.Author: Kathy "unionmare08"
Reviews.Content: It was everything that the seller said it was. It works well, and came with the necessary accessories. The battery life is go, and the sould quality is average. But I bought this as a replacement phone and it does what I needed it to do.

Reviews.Title: Nice, simple phone
Reviews.Author: Caroline Fisher
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a simple phone, this will work for you. Unfortunately, it would not work with T-mobile so I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE FOR INTERNATINAL AND LOCAL USE!!!
Reviews.Author: milotte
Reviews.Content: A VERY NICE PHONE THAT IS SIMPLE AND EASY TO CARRY. IF YOU WANT A NO FRILLS PHONE,THIS IS IT!!!SPEAKERPHONE IS GOOD AND RUBBER KEYS ARE GOOD FOR TEXTING. I RECOMMENDED THIS TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS AND SO FAR THEY LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great international phone
Reviews.Author: Stanislav Selitskiy
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly fine in US, UK and Russia. Unfortunately, was stolen in Moscow, so, it seams, thieves valued it, too.Overall is a great price/performance value for international travelers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone and Service!
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived faster than expected.  Took a full charge fast and The AT&T; Simm Chip went right in and all my contacts were restored.

Reviews.Title: Its a phone...
Reviews.Author: Wade Smart "Wade Smart"
Reviews.Content: The phone is okay. My Nokia was 100% better at texting and in call quality. But, its a phone and it works and its cheap. This was for my son so the texting is more important than the calls so from his point of view - it sucks but that translated means - it works and I have a phone :DThe phone came fast. No worries with the company. They actually sent me 2 phones, tried for four days to get them on the phone to get the second one back. Finally got them and they said they would send a shipping sticker to me... never came. Cant get them back on the phone either. Just rings.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Ree
Reviews.Content: Purchased the phone for to use abroad for my son.  He uses it for local calls within Europe.  Works fine.

Reviews.Title: Very resonsive
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with the prompt response when I had a issue with delivery and tracking

Reviews.Title: affordable phone
Reviews.Author: shay
Reviews.Content: i must admit i had issues with this phone when i got it but the supplier quickly responded to my messages and we worked it out. the phone is exactly what it is described as, it came in a timely manner and it works overseas very good. i would encourage anyone to buy it.

Reviews.Title: This phone is great!
Reviews.Author: M. Schaefer
Reviews.Content: Replaced my old phone that got run over by my car when my phone slipped out of my pocket (still tried to boot up when turned on, but shattered screen meant I had to replace it). "New" one worked like a charm with my sim card, have had nothing but competent functionality from it. Love these little tanks!

Reviews.Title: Phone does NOT work
Reviews.Author: H. Rosin
Reviews.Content: Bought it to use overseas, afterall it is a quad band phone.  It did NOT work from Day 1.  I was stuck overseas without a phone.  Don't even consider buying this.  If you do, well... you've been warned.

Reviews.Title: Phone for international travel
Reviews.Author: tessarat
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for international travel.  I'm on Verizon and don't have a phone that works overseas.  I've used this in conjuction with various SIM cards without any problems in various European countries.  Sound quality is fine.  All I need is a basic phone for calls, so this works just fine for my needs.

Reviews.Title: BlueTooth is limited
Reviews.Author: W. Goodwin "Bill Goodwin"
Reviews.Content: I used this phone (an unlocked AT&T; model) for two weeks in the USA and Costa Rica, where it picked up signals when my Nokia 1208 would not. My only gripe: the BlueTooth function apparently will recognize only headsets and cannot be used to transfer photos and other files or add contacts to the address book. This is a quad-band GSM phone so it should work everywhere. With the expansion of G3 networks, however, next time I will buy an unlocked phone with G3 capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Good Functional Phone
Reviews.Author: Sinu Sekhar
Reviews.Content: If you just need to text and call...this is the phone for you. Very small and light weight as well.

Reviews.Title: MY MISTAKE
Reviews.Author: N. Cunningham
Reviews.Content: Cell Lounge, the provider of this phone is excellent.  Customer service first rate.The phone would not work properly with my service provider AT&T.;  I guess this is one of the possible downsides of any unlocked phone.  However, Cell Lounge was very understanding and refunded my total purchase price.The phone itself seemed fine - full features - great size, etc..

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: The item, I received is a piece of junk. The piece was described as "like new" and "excellent condition".In reality, it was roughly used. One can find a better piece in trash than this one!

ProductInfo.Features:
Display - 65K color internal display, 96 x 96
Talk time - up to 5hrs.
Standby time - up to 250hrs.
Camera Resolution; VGA
Embedded JAVA games
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SGH-a237 Quad-band Cell Phone
